group.name: Entrepreneurship & Lifestyle. Create your Own Business &Life

description:
This meetup is designed for people who are contemplating the idea of creating their own business, or develop a part-time or full-time activity, but are not sure yet what to do.

The objective is to help you developing your idea, and get to know the required steps to start as an entrepreneur.

If you don't have any idea yet, do not worry, we can assist you.

There are good business opportunities in Brussels now, and a great potential of business development, we can help you choose the best business opportunity for you and assist you in your progress.

[The date is not confirmed yet, this meetup will be announced when the first date has been fixed, and the following seminars (that are without date for now) will be mostly in december and january]
name: Introduction to Entrepreneurship - Mindset & Idea Generation
